title: Strengthening App Development Practical Skills: Catchphrase-Based Engineering Education Improvement Strategies

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of core concepts and intermediate-level application skills
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can submit catchphrases for designated technical terms after each class with at least 80% attendance rate
Learners can analyze characteristics of the top five catchphrases selected through peer evaluation and voting
Learners can revise and improve their own catchphrases by referencing instructor-selected exemplary cases
Learners can generate three catchphrases that effectively convey engineering concepts in the final assessment

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
